description: Learn how to create a new resource type and a product with benefits in Nexudus.
introduction_markdown: Products can have any combination of **passes**, **money credit** and **time credit**. **Passes** can be used to check customers in and control access to your IT network. When a customer is checked in, the pass is used. **Money credit** can be set to be valid to pay for bookings, events, products or any other purchases, even plans. If the buyer is a contact (i.e they are not a member - they don't have an active contract). The benefits added to the product are only released when the product is paid. You can make any of the benefits expire after an amount of time. Changes made to benefits of existing products only take affect when the products are purchased again. This feature is relevant to a coworking space because it allows you to offer a variety of products and services to your members and guests.

sub_steps.step_description_markdown: In the Admin Panel, in the left navigation menu, click on **Inventory**.
Click on **Resource types** under the **Rooms and resources** section.
Click on the **Add resource type** button.
In the **Type name** field, enter the name of the resource type. In this case, type `Large Meeting Rooms` and click on **Save changes**.
Click on the **Add product** button and select **Manual entry**.

Update the following fields:
- In the **Product name** field, enter the name of the product. In this case, type `Large Meeting Room Credit`.
- In the **Product description** field, enter a description of the product. In this case, type `$100 of credit to be used in large meeting rooms`.
- In the **Position to display this product at** field, enter the position to display the product at. In this case, type `1`.
- In the **Category** field, enter the category of the product. In this case, type `Benefits`.
- Click on **Save changes**.
Click on the **Add money credit** button.

Update the following fields:
- In the **Credit description** field, enter a description of the credit. In this case, type `Meeting Room Credit`.
- In the **Credit amount** field, enter the amount of credit. In this case, type `100`.
- Under the **Bookings** section, select the **This credit can only be used to pay the following types of resources** radio button.
- Check the **Large Conference Rooms** and **Large Meeting Rooms** check boxes.
- Check the **This credit can be used to pay for event tickets** check box under the **Events** section.
- Click on **Save changes**.

title: Add Product Benefits
